mapper.insert: insert into user(user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_birth, user_email, user_phone, user_gender) values(#{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_name}, #{user_birth}, #{user_email}, #{user_phone}, #{user_gender})
mapper.select: select count(*) from user where user_id = #{user_id}
select user_id from user where user_name = #{user_name} and user_email = #{user_email}
select user_pw from user where user_id = #{user_id} and user_email = #{user_email}
